peril.views.slick.components.menus

Class UpgradeMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.components.menus.Menu
          • peril.views.slick.components.menus.UpgradeMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Container

    public final class UpgradeMenu
extends Menu
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a Menu that allows the user to upgrade the selected ModelCountry and upgrade ModelUnits for points.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joseph_Rolli, Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Menu, UpgradeMenu.UnitTrader

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  UpgradeMenu.UnitTrader
      A object that when clicked upgrades the specified ModelUnit to the ModelUnit above it in terms of strength.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Font armyFont
      The Font that shows the cost of upgrading a ModelUnit.

      The string name of the block link Button.

      The Font that displays the cost of purchases.

      The width that the Image of the selected ModelCountry will be scaled to.

      The EventListener that defines the operations for when the neighbours VisualList is added to the current Frame.

      The VisualList that contains all of the neighbours of the currently selected ModelCountry that can have their links blocked.

      The Image of the SlickPlayers icon.

      The Font for the points of the current ModelPlayer.

      private Font titleFont
      The Font that displays titles.

      The List of UpgradeMenu.UnitTraders that allow the user to upgrade the ModelArmy of the selected ModelCountry.

      The width of the UpgradeMenu.
